name: Blame the Wassie
description:
Market going down?

Rugged again?

Gainzy called you poor on CT?

Take your anger out on the lil shid. He deserves it.

Blame the Wassie is a physics sandbox in which the main aim is to dispose of wassies. Once you've got rid of one, grab another from the bucket. Remember, he is smol, but he's also the source of all your problems.
